getAllPlayers().details: Convenience function to return all addresses of all players
getAllPlayers().return: an array containing all registered players

getScore(address).details: Convenience function to return the total score of a single player
getScore(address).return: the total number of points of the player

isOwner().return: true if `msg.sender` is the owner of the contract.

play().details: Function that calculates total points for a player and saves them to the scoreboard

renounceOwnership().details: Allows the current owner to relinquish control of the contract.

setTxValue(uint256).details: Sets a new value that tx must use

params._newValue: of the total allowed value of a single tx

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

params.newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to.

devdoc.title: A Contract that enforces same total value for all tx

renounceOwnership().notice: Renouncing to ownership will leave the contract without an owner. It will not be possible to call the functions with the `onlyOwner` modifier anymore.
